column2:
"Say, Fourier.
Have you heard anything about [Apprentice]?
Anything at all, even the tiny details."

"I'm sorry...
I've not seen her once since."

"What about you, Rogio?
You've been in Lillipa all this time.
You must've heard something..."

"I've been busy hiding all this time.
Sorry I couldn't be of help..."
"...Damn it."
"Partner."
"1. You're acting strange, Afin."
"2. Is this about that Dark Falz again?"

"You're right.
I need to calm down..."

"When I got the idea that
they might have heard something while on Lillipa,
I just..."

"Sorry, Fourier and Rogio.
I wasn't thinking straight."

"I don't mind.
Sorry I couldn't help you out."

"I've been getting info from
these little ones,
but anything else is beyond me..."
"Still, [Apprentice] clearly needs something from Lillipa."

"The attacks on the Mining Bases
are clearly orchestrated by [Apprentice]."

"What could she be looking for?
At any rate, she sure is taking a while."

"She's just bad at finding things.
She's easily distracted too.
That's just like sis."
"Hey, Afin...?"

"I'm sure everything will be alright,
so put a smile on that face, okay?"

"I don't know the details,
but I can see that this is important to you."

"A positive mindset
is the key to success!"

"Please don't give up!
It will definitely turn out alright!"

"Hehe... Sorry, I got full of myself.
But trust me, I'm speaking from experience."

"A lot can be done, even when you're alone.
I truly believe in that."

"But once you pick yourself up,
you'll realize that you're not alone.
Your friends will always be by your side."

"Right,
<%me>?"
